articles.author: Daria Tarasova-Markina, Svitlana Vlasova, Christian Edwards
articles.title: Zelensky hails Ukraine’s ‘absolute heroism’ on third anniversary of Russia’s invasion - CNN
articles.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky said he was proud of the “absolute heroism” shown by the Ukrainian people in withstanding three years of unprovoked Russian aggression, as European leaders gathered in Kyiv on Monday to mark the third anniversary of Moscow’s full-…
articles.content: President Volodymyr Zelensky said he was proud of the absolute heroism shown by the Ukrainian people in withstanding three years of unprovoked Russian aggression, as European leaders gathered in Kyiv… [+5783 chars]
